entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
